committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Oversight of Government Management, the Federal Workforce, and the District of Columbia

official_title: A bill to provide for the compensation of furloughed Federal employees.
short_title: Federal Employee Retroactive Pay Fairness Act
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Federal Employee Retroactive Pay Fairness Act - Requires federal employees who are furloughed as a result of any lapse in appropriations that begins on or about April 9, 2011, to be compensated at their standard rate of compensation for the period of such lapse as soon as practicable after such lapse ends.

titles.title: Federal Employee Retroactive Pay Fairness Act
A bill to provide for the compensation of furloughed Federal employees.
